en: Jehovah is my light and my salvation; Whom shall I fear? Jehovah is the strength of my life; Of whom shall I be afraid?
hmr: LALPA chu ka var le ka sandamna a nih, tu am ṭîng ka ta? LALPA chu ka hringna kulbîng a nih; tu am ṭîng ka ta?

en: When evil-doers came upon me to eat up my flesh, Even mine adversaries and my foes, they stumbled and fell.
hmr: Thil ṭha naw thawhai, mi dotu- hai le ka hmêlmahai chun, ka sa fâk tuma an mi thaw lai khan, An insui a, an tlu tâwl tah a.

en: Though a host should encamp against me, My heart shall not fear: Though war should rise against me, Even then will I be confident.
hmr: Sipai pâwlhai chun mi thaw tumin mi ep zing hai sienla khawm, Ka lungril hin ṭi naw ni; Ka chungah indona hung suok sienla khawm, Chuong ang a khawm chun ring tlat ka tih.

en: One thing have I asked of Jehovah, that will I seek after: That I may dwell in the house of Jehovah all the days of my life, To behold the beauty of Jehovah, And to inquire in his temple.
hmr: LALPA kuomah thil pakhat ka hnih a, chu mawl chu zawng ka tih, LALPA mawizie hmu ding le a biekina thu indawn dingin, Ka dam sûng poa LALPA ina ka um zing theina ding chu.

en: For in the day of trouble he will keep me secretly in his pavilion: In the covert of his tabernacle will he hide me; He will lift me up upon a rock.
hmr: Lunginzîng ni chun a bûktêah a mi sie hmang âwm sih a, A humhimna puon ina chun mi thuphmang a tih; Lungpui chungah mi dawm kai a tih.

en: And now shall my head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me; And I will offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto Jehovah.
hmr: Tuhin chu a mi dotu, a mîn huolvêltuhai chungtieng ka lu hi dawm kângin um a tih, Chuongchun, a puon ina chun hlimna inthâwinahai inhlân ka tih; Hla sak ka ta, anih, LALPA inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: Hear, O Jehovah, when I cry with my voice: Have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka râwla ka ko che chun lo ngai la, Mi lunginsiet la, mi dawn bawk rawh.

en: When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, Jehovah, will I seek.
hmr: “Ka hmêl zawng ro,” tih a i hril lai khan, ka lungril chun i kuomah, “LALPA, i hmêl zawng ka tih,” a tih a.

en: Hide not thy face from me; Put not thy servant away in anger: Thou hast been my help; Cast me not off, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
hmr: Ka kuoma inthawk hin i hmai thup naw la, I siehlaw hi i lunginsenin sukbohmang naw la, Nang chu a mi ṭhangpuitu i ni hlak a, Aw a mi sandamtu Pathien, mi pei thla naw la, mi mâksan lul naw rawh.

en: When my father and my mother forsake me, Then Jehovah will take me up.
hmr: Ka nu le pa chun an mi mâksan ta sih a, Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chun mi la pawm a tih.

en: Teach me thy way, O Jehovah; And lead me in a plain path, Because of mine enemies.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i lampui chu mîn entir la, Ka hmêlmahai lei hin, Lampui inpheitakah mi ṭhuoi rawh.

en: Deliver me not over unto the will of mine adversaries: For false witnesses are risen up against me, And such as breathe out cruelty.
hmr: A mi dotuhaiin nuom nuoma an mi thaw dingin mi pe lul naw la, Hretu tehlêm chun an mi thawh a, nunsiet thu sâksuok hlaktuhai chun.

en: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of Jehovah In the land of the living.
hmr: Mi hring rama hin, LALPA ṭhatna hmu inring naw lang chu ka chau ta ding a nih.

en: Wait for Jehovah: Be strong, and let thy heart take courage; Yea, wait thou for Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA chu nghâk zing rawh, Hrâttakin um la, i lungril chu insukhuoi raw se; Anih, LALPA chu nghâk zing rawh.
